Pre-Game Insights: Namibia has showcased a credible performance, securing four wins in eight matches to earn a commendable fourth-place spot on the points table.
In contrast, the United States of America has faced challenges, winning only two of their four encounters, resulting in a fifth-place ranking.

The difference in win percentage and match outcome highlights Namibia’s consistent effort, setting them apart from the United States’ struggling form, as they strive to climb the competitive rankings.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The stage is set for an intense clash at the Wanderers Cricket Ground, Windhoek, on September 16th at 1:00 PM IST.
Namibia Playing 11: Michael van Lingen, JP Kotze, Jan Frylinck, Gerhard Erasmus©, Malan Kruger, JJ Smit, Zane Green(wk), Shaun Fouche, Bernard Scholtz, Tangeni Lungamene, Ben Shikongo
